title: Is Diary of a Wimpy Kid a graphic novel? - Quora
tags: Diary of a Wimpy Kid (book series)

response.answer_text: Yes. The definition of a graphic novel is: “ book made up of comics content. Although the word "novel" normally refers to long fictional works, the term "graphic novel" is applied broadly and includes fiction, non-fiction, and anthologized work. It is distinguished from the term "comic book", which is generally used for comics periodicals.” Diary of a Wimpy Kid is not just comic paneled, but also not completely a novel, so it can be classified as a graphic novel.
